#### KidKare  
Food Program

## We know Child and Adult Care Food Program (CACFP) claims can be difficult &
time-consuming to process, but with KidKare, the process is much simpler.
You'll be able to catch errors that you could easily miss if you process
claims by hand with our CACFP software.

Who should use it?

##### 🏢 Single location childcare centers  
(without a sponsor)

#### KidKare  
Accounting

###### Designed for in-home childcare providers. We know you're a small

parents and tracking your expenses easier than ever.

Who should use it?

##### 🏠 In-home childcare providers  
(Whether they participate in the Food Program or not.)

__ Learn More

#### KidKare  
For Sponsors

###### Take back hours of your time. KidKare for Sponsors cut down on the

##### 🏠 Home Sponsors

KidKare

Food Program

#### The fastest way for childcare centers to process their Food Program
(CACFP) claims.

##### KidKare Food Program is a full-service Food Program software solution
for US-single location childcare centers. It helps you plan menus, track
attendance, and communicate with parents, all while claiming Food Program
reimbursements on time.  
  
Today, more than 67,000 providers trust KidKare to keep them compliant with
Food Program regulations.

Who should use it?  
🏢 For single location childcare centers  
(without a sponsor).

Start for free >

Try KidKare Food Program for free for 30 days.

____ CACFP Claim Calculation

Over 200 edit checks on food and attendance.

____ Menu Planning

Plan your monthly menus and share them with parents with just a few clicks.

____ Attendance & Meal Counts

Record meal counts and attendance on any mobile device at point-of-service in
each classroom.

____ Food Service Expense Tracking

Document what you spend on food and supplies to ensure compliance.

____ Milk Audit

View the Milk Audit and plan for possible shortages.

____ KidKare eForms

Send and store enrollment paperwork online.

____ Parent Portal

Stay connected with families with ease.

###### Important Features

KidKare

Messaging

###### Keep in communication with parents by sending updates throughout the
day with KidKare’s messaging feature. Send bulk messages or individual
messages according to your needs. Every message includes space for
attachments, so you can send menus or other information to parents with a few
simple clicks.

Health

Solutions

###### Record children’s temperatures on-site as they check-in. You can also
send surveys to parents and screen them for illness before they arrive at your
center.

Ounce Equivalents

Calculation

###### Record grains with the new grains ounce equivalents unit—without the
math and the headache. This feature calculates grains ounce equivalents based
on standard units of measurement, like cups.

See all our features >

###### Benefits

  * \- Access documents on any device with an internet connection.
  * \- Say goodbye to paper & save your documents digitally.

  * \- Perform over 200 edit checks on food and attendance entries.
  * \- Have confidence that all meal pattern requirements are met.

#### Try KidKare Food Program for free for 30 days.

Start for free today >

KidKare

Accounting

#### Simplify your childcare business.

##### As a in-home childcare provider, you have a lot to do and not enough
time to do it. Why keep juggling paper invoices, receipts, and other financial
documentation? Today, more than 67,000 providers trust KidKare software to
keep them compliant with CACFP regulations.

##### KidKare Accounting allows you to record expenses, track income, and
print reports for your taxes.

Who should use it?

🏠 In-home childcare providers  
(Whether they participate in the Food Program or not.).

Start for free >

Try KidKare Accounting for free for 30 days.

____ Accept Payments Online

Stop relying on parents to bring their checkbooks. Now your parents can pay by
credit card on any device at any time.

____ Automate Invoices

Get paid faster and on time by automating email invoices with a couple of
clicks.

____ Issue Refunds

Guarantee accurate & timely refunds.



____ Split Payments Between Parents

Bill for unique families & situations.

____ Track Expenses

Are you still saving every single receipt for your childcare business?
Generate and track your business expenses with simplicity and ease.

____ Financial Reports

Manage your business finances by using our different accounting reports.

____ Tax Features

Print important tax documents and stay organized throughout the year with
KidKare Accounting.

____ Food Program Management

Whether you are on the Food Program or not, you can still deduct the meals and
snacks you serve throughout the year.

____ Parent Portal

This feature will give peace of mind to your parents and you will never have
to wait for payments again.

Do your parents also enjoy child updates during the day? Send them messages
with updates!

###### Important Features

Refunding Money

Becomes A Breeze

Refund cash, checks, or add credits to an account when necessary.

Manage Participants

In One Place

###### Manage all aspects of billing, invoices, and payments for participants'
accounts with an easy-to-navigate dashboard. As a bonus, you can maintain
billing information for participants without changing their enrollment
records.

Split Payments

Between Parents

###### Each family has their own unique makeup. Easily split payments between
parents—so parents can choose how they want to pay. Everyone gets their own
invoice and statement of account.  
  
Need to bill for agencies or subsidies? You can do that, too!

See all our features >

###### Benefits

  * \- Eliminate paper and bill parents electronically.
  * \- Create recurring invoices that run on a schedule you choose.
  * \- Be prepared for tax time.

  * \- Keep track of your payments with ease.
  * \- Track all your income sources in one place.

#### Try KidKare Accounting for free for 30 days.

Start for free today >

KidKare For Sponsors

#### Take back hours of your time with KidKare

###### Whether you’re a home or center sponsor, we’ve designed a comprehensive
Food Program sponsor software to help you improve your bottom line and grow
your sponsorship. From detailed analysis and reporting on provider or child
files, to automating key areas of your operation including claim processing,
online enrollment, eligibility, and much more.  
  
Our 30 years of experience providing software for the Food Program has you
covered.

Why KidKare

Maximize CACFP Reimbursement

Track Attendance & Meal Counts

Go Paperless With eForms

Frequently Asked Questions

  *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   *   * 

#####  __How does invoicing and parent billing work?

You can create individual invoices that are emailed to parents and you also
have the option to make invoices recurring. If you sign up for ePay, the
parents will be able to make payments online.

#####  __Can parents use this to pay online?

Yes, subscribers to the Accounting feature will have the option to use ePay.
ePay is an optional product that may require a separate fee.

#####  __How does it track expenses for taxes?

You can quickly and easily enter expenses, mileage, hours and care so that you
can claim them as business expenses. The program can also calculate the
time/space % for your home, so that you can claim the parts of your home that
you use for your business (play area, office area, kitchen, etc.) on your
taxes.

#####  __How does it help with my taxes?

KidKare will help you with documenting important information related to your
tax claim, store this data for you for years to come, allow you to print
important tax documents, and make it easy to stay current and organized
throughout the year!

#####  __How does the free trial work?

We offer a free 30 day trial of the Accounting features. After that we will
begin charging $99 + tax per year.

#####  __Can I download KidKare from the app store?

No need to download anything new to use KidKare — just open any browser from
any device with an internet connection, and navigate to the KidKare App to
login. This works on desktop computers, mobile phones, and tablets.

#####  __Where can I find help or training for using KidKare?

KidKare help and support provide you with access to free training webinars,
recorded videos, and useful help articles.

#####  __How do I cancel?

Go to Home > My Site. Select the Cancel Subscription option in the business
detail section. For additional assistance please contact our support team.
